item.title: John Krasinski’s Jack Ryan Movie Filming Start Window Reportedly Revealed
item.description: The filming start window for John Krasinski's Jack Ryan movie is reportedly revealed and will bring the Tom Clancy franchise back quite soon.

item.title: Sonic & Super Smash Bros. Movie Crossover Chances Addressed By Ben Schwartz: “We’re Getting Closer”
item.description: Ben Schwartz weighs in on the chances of Sonic the Hedgehog and Super Smash Bros. getting a crossover movie amid both franchises' success.

item.title: How Mufasa Really Became The Lion King, Changing Everything We've Known For 30 Years
item.description: Mufasa: The Lion King shows how the titular lion becomes the king of the Pride Lands, retconning the original story and changing everything we know.
